attributes.review: I open the app to the most disgusting thing. I did not choose to see a Cheeto looking guy freaking NAKED! This app supports a sexiest, racist, homophopic person not president and should be deleted. If I could give it zeros stars I would please delete. Thank you!
attributes.title: DISGUSTING 🤮

attributes.review: Took about a week to download and crashed my phone just like the reviews disappointed please save your time and DO NOT buy totally a waste of storage and time!!
attributes.title: No please just no

attributes.review: I got this app to get more information on our wonderful president🙏 but the app took 3 full days to download! Once downloaded, the app made my phone crash anytime I opened it. I had to get a new phone! Not good. Sad.
attributes.title: Unsafe!

attributes.review:
When I got this app it was so ugly, my friend Barron trump told me to expect that and then when I went on, someone started speaking to me thru the speaker!! 🤢 they said they would sell me drugs to vote for TRUMP!! this app is terrible. I do not recommend ❤️
I just don’t vibe w her😍
attributes.title: THIS APP WAS SPYING ON ME

attributes.review: This app is overall horrible, distasteful and shows how much effort they put into making this god forsaking app. 👀 by far the worst app I’ve downloaded so far. 💯
attributes.title: App is very buggy and keeps crashing. 👎🏽💀

attributes.review: I was honestly on the fence about Trump 2020 but after downloading this app, I jumped off of the idea really quick. The app is poorly designed and the ideas are one-sided and biased, but not a good way. He needs out of office
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: This app took 42 hours to download. I was so looking forward to using this app but it is clustered, hard to use, and full of lies. I will not be using again. Also apps for presidents are stupid. 🍊
attributes.title: This needs to go

attributes.review: This app is very horrible it glitches and logs you out and even hacked my iCloud. It is just a real bad and keeps logging me out and I won’t let me get in to the app and It take really long to download
attributes.title: Spam

attributes.review: seriously a bad app!! how is it even in the App Store at this point - it’s literally not worth the storage it takes up 0/10 I opened the app and immediately felt nauseous
attributes.title: not worth the phone storage!!!

attributes.review: This app continuously shut down on me and glitched!! Would not recommend to anyone unless you want your phone storage used for no reason and your battery exhausted.
attributes.title: Awful App
